character_creation.text: Choose your path. Who will you become?

options.description: A channeler of spirits, the medium uses ritualistic possession to achieve higher powers and reveal hidden information.
Summoners manifest spirits of the dead in the physical realm, raising unflinching soldiers.
Shrouded in secrecy, a thaumaturgist is one who uses exotic, morbid ingredients to concoct an astounding array of magical items.

intro.text: You awaken in a dark chamber, echoes of the past swirling in your mind. You take your first steps into the unknown.
